headline.main: NEWS FROM ALBANY.; The Division of Madison County The Insurance Department A Praiseworthy Regulation The License Question.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Committee of the Whole has before it a bill for the division of Madison County into two Jury Districts, and the holding of Courts in each, and the House is entertained by watching the progress of the "tempest in a teapot" which this measure has created in that region. headline.main: OUR WASHINGTON CORRESPONDENCE.; A PHYSICAL AND A MORAL RESURRECTION MR. STANTON'S HEALTH PERMANENTLY UNRELIABLE THE "ONWARD" POLICY IN SEASON THE FRENCH EMPEROR SENATOR SUMNER'SERROR.

docs.lead_paragraph: A glorious day we have had at the National Capital. An atmosphere bright as youth, and inspiring as the presence of beauty, has enwrapped the earth; while an air, sweet as ever breathed over a bed of violets, sweeps from the warm South, as if to remind us of the love that once reached us from that land of flowers. This is the first utterance of Spring.

headline.main: A DASH BY GEN. LANDER.; The Rebel Camp at Blooming Gap Bro- ken Up. Seventeen Rebel Officers and Forty-five Privates Captured. GEN. LANDER'S OFFICIAL REPORT. THE SCENE OF GEN. LANDER'S DASH.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gen. LANDER made a forced march on Thursday night, surprising and breaking up the rebel camp at Blooming Gap, killing thirteen; capturing seven- teen commissioned officers and forty five privates, and losing but two men and six horses. He led the attack in person, at the head of the First Virginia Cavalry.

docs.snippet: Short-hand narrations of our recent disaster in North Carolina, were received during yesterday, and brief summaries of such as were reliable telegraphed you. Up to this writing (11 o'clock) nothing additional has been elicited in an accurate form.
